item.title: About
item.description: I work at the Scala Center at EPFL. I hack on compilers and tooling. I am also the Scala Improvement Process lead. I contribute to the following projects: Zinc, the Scala incremental compiler. sbt, the Scala build tool. Scala Center projects, like the Scala Platform and compiler plugins. Scalac, the Scala compiler. Contact me via: GitHub. Gitter. Twitter.
